description:
Over 5,993Â successful students have enrolled in this course with 5-star reviews!

This course was updated April 12th, 2016.

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Website Design - If you want to learn how to build a fully mobile-responsive website for your business without touching a line code, this course is for you!

What do you get from this course?

Learn the exact 12 steps I used to build a mobile website design for my marketing and consulting business with no coding and no experience necessary.

**This course uses Strikingly website designer. You can create a free account at Strikingly dot com. Some of the lessons in this course require Strikingly Pro features, which start at $8/mo. (Still a very low price to pay for an awesome professional website).

What you will learn:

  • The 12 Simple Steps to Build a Mobile Website with no coding.
  • How to build an awesome website with no experience necessary.
  • Learn how to have your website designed in 1-2 hours.

Who is this course for?

Freelancers, Entrepreneurs, Business Owners, Photographers, and anyone that wants to learn to build a fully mobile-responsive website in a couple of hours.

Do I need experience with web design?

Nope. The website builder that I teach in this course, Strikingly, uses a text editor and drag and drop design to make building a website simple. I will teach you how to use it to build your website in the shortest time possible.

If you can edit a Microsoft Word document, you can build your own mobile website in 1-2 hours (not a typo :))

How is the course taught?

Screen capture video lecture which allow you to see my screen and what to click as I walk you step-by-step through building your website.

The course includes full access to all video lectures immediately and includes all future updates FREE.

I look forward to teaching you!

See you on the inside!

Josh :)
title: Website Design - Build an Amazing Web Design (No Experience)
